detail_desc: Blouse in an airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with decorative gathers at the back and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and ties at the sides.
Treggings in stretch, denim-look jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Backpack in grained imitation leather with a handle and zip at the top, adjustable shoulder straps and one outer zipped compartment. Padded back plate. Lined. Size approx. 13x26x32 cm.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes and designs. Diameter approx. 3.5 cm, 5 cm, 6 cm, 7 cm and 8.5 cm.
Cycling shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Trousers in cotton-blend slub jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, slightly lower crotch, gently tapered legs, side pockets and ribbed hems. Regular fit.
Skirt in soft velour with an elasticated waist and flare to the hem.
Slip-on trainers with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Imitation cork insoles and textured rubber soles.
Playsuit in an airy viscose weave with narrow shoulder straps and a flounce with narrow, concealed elastication at the top. Elasticated seam and a sewn-on bow at the waist, and side pockets.

Baby Exclusive. All-in-one suit in a double-layered, textured organic cotton weave with short, flounced sleeves, buttons down the front and elasticated hems. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (not in sizes 1-4Y).
Fully lined shaping swimsuit that has a sculpting effect on the tummy, back and seat. Lightly padded cups, support panels, decorative gathers in the sides, and detachable shoulder straps.
Sleeveless top in soft jersey containing some linen with a small, pleated frill trim around the armholes and gathers in the sides for best fit.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, textured knit with a slightly wider, roll-edge neckline and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Hat in braided straw containing glittery threads. Width of brim 8.5 cm.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in soft crinkled jersey made from recycled polyester. Smocking at the top and hem, decorative buttons down the front and long, wide sleeves with elasticated cuffs.
Brazilian briefs in cotton jersey with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a collar, V-neck, buttons down the front, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Short dress in an airy weave with flounced details. V-neck, a sewn-in wrapover at the front and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Top in soft viscose jersey with lace over the shoulders and a rounded hem.
Sleeveless blouse in a lightly crinkled weave. Small, frilled, smocked collar with a V-shaped opening and ties at the front. Lined.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Dungaree dress in washed, stretch denim with a heart-shaped chest pocket, adjustable straps with metal fasteners, and visible seams front and back.
Sandals in imitation leather with square toes, covered block heels and narrow straps that cross over the foot and wind around the ankle. Adjustable fastening with a small metal buckle. Heel 2.5 cm.

Sleeveless, ankle-length jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with a wrapover V-neck with a concealed press-stud at the top. Concealed zip at the back, side pockets, fake welt back pockets, a detachable tie belt at the waist and tapered legs with creases.
Washed cotton twill trousers in a regular fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.
Cargo trousers in cotton twill with a metal key chain. High waist with elastication at the back, zip fly and button, front pockets, flap leg pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.

Dress in a patterned viscose weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, an elasticated seam and decorative bow at the waist, and side pockets. Unlined.

Pyjamas with a strappy top and shorts in soft pima cotton jersey. Fitted V-neck top with a lace trim at the top and narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Short shorts with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and lace-trimmed hems.
Hooded top in cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Brazilian briefs in soft cotton jersey with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Cropped top in thin, batik-patterned sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves, ribbed cuffs and a raw-edge hem.
Calf-length skirt in a softly draping viscose weave. High, frill-trimmed waist with covered elastication and decorative buttons at the front, and side pockets. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Short, wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a stand-up collar, zip at the top, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Short, wide dress in airy fabric with a small, frilled collar. Deep opening at the back with narrow ties at the back of the neck and back. Long balloon sleeves with a puff at the shoulders and narrow, covered elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs. Gathered seams at the waist and hips. Jersey lining. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Sandals with crossover straps at the front and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles with a braided jute trim. Heel approx. 7 cm.

Cropped top in soft, patterned jersey with a smocked bodice and square neckline with covered elastication at the top. Long, wide sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs, and a seam and small flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Shopper in transparent plastic with two handles at the top. Size 14x26x35 cm.
Cap in washed cotton twill with an adjustable tab and metal fastener at the back.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Thin metal chain necklaces, one with a pendant. Adjustable length, 53-61 cm and 63-75 cm.
Pool shoes with a glittery, padded foot strap and moulded soles that are fluted underneath (sizes 7-9 with an elastic heel strap).
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
Short-sleeved top in linen jersey with a V-neck.
Hipster briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.

TOCA LIFE x H&M. Small, thickly padded backpack in soft pile in the shape of a sloth. Zip at the back, a handle at the top and adjustable shoulder straps with plastic fasteners. Size approx. 16x38 cm.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim in a slightly looser fit. Extra-high waist, zip fly and button and gently tapered legs.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details, ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Short, straight-cut dress in soft velvet made from a silk blend with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck.  Wide, flared cuffs with a slit and covered button, and a double-layered hem with fringing. Lined.
Leggings in sturdy jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Bow tie in jacquard-weave satin with a matching handkerchief. Bow tie with an adjustable strap and fastening at the back. Width 11 cm. Size of handkerchief 33x33 cm.
Classic T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline and print motif on the front.
Jumper in a soft, textured knit containing some wool with a lined hood. Cable-knit front, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Set with a short-sleeved shirt and matching chinos. Shirt in cotton poplin with a grandad collar, classic front, yoke at the back, chest pocket and rounded hem. Chinos in a linen and cotton weave. Relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, adjustable, elasticated waist, diagonal side pockets and a welt back pocket.
Set with three ear cuffs, three non-matching earrings and two hoop earrings that can be worn as a pair. Size from 0.2 cm to 2.5 cm.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Hat in a jacquard-knit mohair blend with a ribbed, turned-up hem.
Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, double-layered, drawstring hood, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short jersey skirt with concealed elastication at the waist.
Waist bag in a sturdy weave with an appliqué on the front, zip at the top and a zipped outer compartment. Adjustable waist belt with a plastic fastener. Size 3.5x12x19.5 cm.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Saddle bag in imitation leather with an imitation suede flap with a metal fastener. One inner compartment and a detachable narrow metal chain shoulder strap with an imitation leather section on the shoulder. Lined. Size 7x14.5x17.5 cm.
Long-sleeved jumper in fine-knit cotton with terry hearts on the front and sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Thin metal chain necklaces with pendants in various designs. One long necklace and two shorter ones. Adjustable length 76-82.5 cm, 48-54 cm and 42-48.5 cm.
Knee-length skirt in imitation leather. High waist with concealed elastication, a concealed zip at the back and a laser-cut hem. Unlined.
Top in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a tie detail at the hem. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Jumper in fine-knit cotton with buttons on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed cotton denim. Relaxed fit with a slightly lower crotch, button fly and roomy legs with raw-edge hems.
5-pocket ankle-length trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim, straight legs.
Sleeveless blouse in a soft weave with a small stand-up collar, concealed buttons down the front and open chest pockets. Yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with a square neckline and smocked bodice. Small frill trim around the neckline and over the shoulders and long sleeves with a smocked seam at the top to create a puff effect at the shoulders. Narrow elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs. Unlined.
Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist.

Calf-length wrap dress in a viscose jacquard weave with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and a V-neck with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the front. Seam at the waist with ties at one side and a wide flounce down the front and at the hem. Unlined.
Dressing gown in soft viscose jersey with a detachable tie belt at the waist and lace trims at the cuffs and hem.
Full-length trousers in sturdy jersey. High waist with concealed elastication, a concealed zip in one side and wide, straight legs with sewn-in creases front and back and a slit at one side.

Blouse in an airy, weave with a V-neck, buttons and pin-tucks down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, short, flounced sleeves and a rounded hem. Unlined. The polyester content of the blouse is partly recycled.
Sports set with a short-sleeved top and shorts in fast-drying, functional fabric. Top with a print motif on the front and reflective details. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim, straight legs.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Scarf in a patterned weave. Size 50x50 cm.
